verses.text: Ay wal ek' wach' lolonel t'a in pensar. Ol in b'itan t'a winh rey yet' juntzanh in lolonel chi'. Ha in ti' lajan icha stz'ib'lab' junok mach te jelan stz'ib'ani.
Ach rey, a achnhej wach' ilji t'a yichanh masanil heb' winh winak. Te wach'nhej tas tzala', te jelan a loloni yujto syak'nhej swach'k'olal Dios t'a ib'anh.
Ak'och jachan k'een espada t'a a nanhal, ach winak te ak'um owal, te b'inajnac ach, te ay wal elk'ochi.
Ixic t'a yib'anh nok' a chej yet' a poder yic tzak'an ganar owal, yic sb'oji yaj lolonel t'a stojolal t'a heb' emnaquil. Niwan tastac satub'tac ol a k'ulej yet' ipalil.
Ach ko reyal, a jul-lab' te jay snhi' ol b'at ch'apnaj t'a snhi' sk'ool heb' ajk'ool. Yuj chi' ol telwoc heb' anima yic juntzanh chonhab' t'a skal oc.
Ach ko Diosal, yajal ach t'a smasanil tiempo. Yajal ach, wach'nhej tz'aj a ch'olb'itan tastac.
Ha wal tojolal scha a k'ool, max schalaj a k'ool chukal. Yuj chi' ix ach sik'el Dios, aton a Diosal. Ix yak' niwan tzalajk'olal t'ayach t'a yichanh juntzanhxo heb' ay yopisio ed'oc.
Tz'el sjab' sperfumeal mirra, áloes yet' te' canela ayoch t'a a pichul. Ha son ay sch'anhal ol ak'an tzalaj a k'ool t'a a pat marfilnhej ayoch yelwanub'oc.
Ay heb' ix yisil heb' winh rey t'a skal heb' avtab'il uuj. Ha t'a a tz'ey t'a a wach', ata' ayek' ix reina. Ha k'een oro yelxo wal wach' ayoch t'a spichul ix.
Ach yisil rey, maclej wal ab'i, scham wal ab'an tas ol wal t'ayach. Manhxo a na heb' a k'ab' oc yet' heb' etchonhab',
yujto a winh rey chi' snib'an swach'il ilji, aton winh ajalil. Hak'uem a b'ha t'a winh.
Ol yak' silab' heb' aj Tiro t'ayach. Ha heb' niwac b'eyum, ol snib'ej heb' yoch amigooc.
Tik sja ix ix wan yoch yetb'eyumoc winh rey, wach'nhej yilji ix, yisil pax ix junocxo winh rey. Oro ayoch yelwanub'oc spichul ix.
Wach'nhej yaj sb'o ix yet' spichul, tz'ik'jib'at ix t'a winh rey. Tzak'anoch heb' ix cob'estac yuk'lewoc ix, aton heb' ix yamiga ix.
Stzalaj heb' ix sb'at heb' ix, masanto sk'och heb' ix t'a spat winh rey chi'.
Ach rey, a heb' uninal ol em k'ojan b'aj tz'emtaxon k'ojan heb' a mam icham. Ol ak'anoch yopisio heb' yic syilan masanil yol a macb'en tik heb'.
Ha in ol wak' nachajcot a b'i yuj masanil anima toto ol aljoc t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik. Ol yal wach' lolonel junjun chonhab' t'ayach t'a masanil tiempo.
